body:
>I'm searching for an automated image aligner for handheld HDRI 
>Shots. I'm not satisfied with the automaic mode of Photomatix for 
>example.


Hi Jan,


What you're looking for is a feature in the new Photoshop CS3 
Extended. I have been very happy with the results.


Lisa Yimm
HDR-VFX
